sentence.Network_en: The robot features a double jointed neck that helps it achieve more expressive postures.
sentence.Network_cn: 这台机器人脖颈处有双接缝,有助于他表达更多情感.

sentence.Network_en: Barrel hocks or cow hocks are most objectionable . Slipped or double - jointed hocks are very faulty.
sentence.Network_cn: 桶状飞节、牛肢都非常不好,脱臼或双关节的飞节属于严重缺陷.

sentence.Network_en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentence.Network_cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。
